LanguageData.CommandOpenCloseWindowLightDesc: Allow or block light to pass through the window. A colonist will come soon to perform the task.
LanguageData.CommandOpenCloseWindowVentDesc: Allow or block air to pass through the window. A colonist will come soon to perform the task.
LanguageData.IndoorsNoNaturalLightPenaltyDesc: Multiplies the outdoors level degradation when the pawn is indoors but not under a window.
LanguageData.BeautySensitivityReductionDesc: Numbs the pawns' sensitivity to beauty to compensate for the amount added by "Nature is Beautiful" and captured by the windows.
